Posts.Content: Jun 4, 2012 07:47PM Crestwood1957 wrote: I havent been here in awhile....had chemo for 4 and a half months...I was diagnoised a stage 4 BC which spread to other parts of my body...I have been in remission since this past January and been living like as if there was no tomorrow..I have that fear in the back of my mind along with much chemo brain effects....that the cancer will return...I know Im not alone... Today however I found myself telling my husband that this week getting the herceptin I want to discuss with the Dr about issues I been feeling where I felt the odd feeling when I first was told of the "C"..I think I might be stressing myself over this...worried...I have been doing alot of yard work...and other things...granted my body isnt 30 anymore...but I have alot of energy that I feel at times 30...(I am 54) I go go go...never nap anymore...not since chemo ended.. Husband thinks Im over doing it....?? I hope thats all it is.. Yes ladies Im venting and Im scared..who isnt right??  I will have this port the rest of my life...I have herceptin every 3 weeks and I get a shot for my bones eveyr 4 weeks..I totally feel like Ive never gone thru what I had gone thru ..but like I said as of the last 2 days...something inside where the cancer was at my rib on the right is bothering me...aggghhh..ok..I need to go to bed and try to sleep...Im a worry wort... god bless you all....Rosie
Posts.Title: Why am I so emotional??? Iwillwinthisbattle DivineMrsM
Summer 2012 RADS HANG OUT Stacie rgina
